title: (x) 'PROA' geometric caps - custom by Spin {David Sudweeks}
content:
It looks like the style has been customized a bit, but does anyone recognize the actual typeface?

png is attached.

Thanks a million, and happy new year-ish!

/n

author: nsuperman86

comments.content: Custom type from **[Spin](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202022622/http:/www.spin.co.uk/)**. To see more of it, see 'Identity' section of their site and find the project 'PROA Building'.
